title: It's not Bodoni, but I need the South Beach Diet font
content:
Can anyone ID this? It seems like Bodoni but the curves on the serifs don’t agree, any pointers will be much appreciated!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SBLOGO.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=SBLOGO.jpg) | 93.69 KB |
author: dunnyman

comments.content: the logo won’t display. can you re attach it (edit your original post and change out the attachment).

_Your sample doesnt seem to work, but if your looking for \* [THIS](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128102238/http:/www.hha.com.au/NonFiction_300dpi/south%20beach%20diet.jpg) \*.:_  
‘Torino _( Condensed )_’, _by [Alessandro Butti](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Alessandro%20Butti)_.?

_( And, ‘Rotis’, by [Otl Aicher](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Otl%20Aicher).. :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128102238/http:/www.formlos.net/)
